abstract: Returns an array of metadata items from the container with the specified format.
overview:
## Return Value

An array of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem] objects, one for each metadata item in the container of the specified format, or an empty array if there is no metadata for the specified format.

## Discussion

You can filter the array to the specific items of interest using the class methods provided by [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem], like [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/metadataItems(from:filteredByIdentifier:)] or [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/metadataItems(from:with:)].

You can call this method without blocking the current thread after you’ve asynchronously loaded the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset/availableMetadataFormats] property.

# metadata(forFormat:)

**Instance Method**

Returns an array of metadata items from the container with the specified format.

## Declaration

```swift
func metadata(forFormat format: AVMetadataFormat) -> [AVMetadataItem]
```

## Parameters

- **format**: The metadata format for which you want items.

## Return Value

An array of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem] objects, one for each metadata item in the container of the specified format, or an empty array if there is no metadata for the specified format.

## Discussion

You can filter the array to the specific items of interest using the class methods provided by [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem], like [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/metadataItems(from:filteredByIdentifier:)] or [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/metadataItems(from:with:)].

You can call this method without blocking the current thread after you’ve asynchronously loaded the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset/availableMetadataFormats] property.
title: metadata(forFormat:)
